ComicInfo.Series: Danger Doll Squad Presents: Amalgama Lives
ComicInfo.Summary:
Amalgama faces off with the All-New, All-Different Danger Doll Squad at last! It’s the Zombie Tramp/Vampblade/DollFace mash-up versus Black Betty, DollFace and friends! If you think you know how this ends… you’re wrong!
The origin of the next big Danger Doll universe creation concludes!

ComicInfo.Title: Part Four
